vote.title: Appointment of Craig Conley, Deputy Director, Office of the Mayor, 90 W. Broad Street, Columbus, Ohio 43215, to serve on the IMPACT Community Action Board, to represent the City of Columbus’ interests, in his official capacity, with a term start date of January 1, 2025 and expiration date of December 31, 2027.  (resume attached)
vote.description:
Title
 
Appointment of Craig Conley, Deputy Director, Office of the Mayor, 90 W. Broad Street, Columbus, Ohio 43215, to serve on the IMPACT Community Action Board, to represent the City of Columbus’ interests, in his official capacity, with a term start date of January 1, 2025 and expiration date of December 31, 2027.  (resume attached)
